issue.title: [R] Typo in R documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3528). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a typo in the R-package documentation.

 

**"ordred" --> "ordered"**

 

Just creating the story here to accompany a pending PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3528?focusedCommentId=16652403) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2769
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2769>
